{"id":929521766,"question_id":2723,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1680858807,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/929521766/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Longest Balanced Substring of a Binary String","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int findTheLongestBalancedSubstring(String s) {\n        \n        HashMap<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>(); //val, idx\n        map.put(0, -1);\n        int sum=0;\n        int max=0;\n        Integer prev = null;\n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++){\n            \n            if(prev!=null && prev==1 && s.charAt(i)=='0')\n                map.put(0, i);\n            \n            \n            sum += (s.charAt(i)=='0')? -1:1;\n            \n            if(map.containsKey(sum)){\n                max = Math.max(max, i-map.get(sum));\n            }else{\n                \n                if(s.charAt(i)=='0')\n                    map.put(sum, i);\n            }\n            System.out.println(sum);\n            \n            \n            \n            prev= s.charAt(i)-'0';\n            \n        }\n        return max;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-longest-balanced-substring-of-a-binary-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
